    edu.cmu.sphinx.api  
    edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.adaptation  
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend
    Provides a set of high level classes and interfaces that are used to perform digital signal processing for speech recognition.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.feature
    Provides classes that processes features.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate
    Provides classes that represent acoustic model in terms of a set of tied states.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer
    Provides classes that represent a trainable acoustic model.
